attributes.action: EU referendum rules: Say NO to a 2nd EU referendum
attributes.additional_details: We entered the EU referendum with a full understanding that a majority vote of either leave or remain would stand. To ask parliament to now overturn that decision and hold another referendum based on the percentage of voters or votes cast negates all basic rules of the rights of the people of self determination and democracy. This is about democracy not leave or remain.
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon HM government to continue with the mandate given by the British people on 23 June 2016 to leave the EU and to uphold the demorcratic voting rights of the majority of the British electorate
